page.title: 08 CONTINUING TO LEARN
page.content: {WHITLETTS PRIMARY SCHOOL. {************************* The oldest school,Whitletts Primary, dates back to 1873,when Whitletts was a mining community in its own right.A new extension was added in 1908.The school now provides education for 150 pupils and has 8 teachers,including the head teacher. All three schools provide a blend of traditional and more recent forms of curriculum, which enable the children to go on educational visits,to take up hobbies which interest them and to work with computers. { ****** During the evenings and at week-ends, Dalmilling School is used for clubs by the Community Education Service.Also a summer play scheme is run each year. These are enjoyable and worthwhile community activities.
